annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 201(a)(4) of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Authority to the Deputy Mayor for Planning and Economic Development, see Mayor’s Order 2006-103, July 28, 2006 ( 53 DCR 6398).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: For additional requirements for the transfer of certain NCRC properties, see sections 201 through 209 of D.C. Law 16-287.
